1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug Glasscock-Poor-team name altered, position altered, crease, paper loss upper left border and heavy corner wear-$175.00. Card will ship on Monday.

S/h is $4.75 unless you live in California, Oregon or the State of Washington in which case the s/h is $5.00. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
